subject: CSS
question:
For getting familiar with this advamced pattern…
Complete the code below so you create a grid that will not have a defined number of columns, but that will create a as many columns of a minimum of 200px wide and autosized to 1fr wide in case that the content is wider than 200px.
*Tip: You will need to combine minmax() and repeat(); 
#parent{
	display: grid;
	...
	grid-auto-rows: minmax(100px, auto);
	grid-gap: 20px;
}
